Name: Chestnut Grove
About the game: EXPERIENCE CONFINEMENT When your daily life is confined to a small area, you start to take a closer look at the familiar. See how the crisis impacts your usual environment. CHESTNUT GROVE is a short first-person experience, created to document the early days of the COVID-19 pandemic through a personal lens. This game is a short walking simulator with some light puzzles and can usually be completed within 30 minutes. FEATURES a short first-person experience portraying life during the early COVID-19 pandemic. a focus on atmosphere and mood. all documents featured within the game are authentic and taken from real life light puzzles and environmental interactions.
